author: Staff Reporter
text:
A standard IV boy, who sustained injuries after his classmates beat him, died at the Salem Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital here on Saturday.

P. Suriya (10) of Kozhikalnatham, studying in the Panchayat Union Middle School, had a quarrel with two of his classmates on February 29. The 9-year-old boys allegedly assaulted Suriya.

Based on his mother’s complaint, the Tiruchengode Rural police registered a case . The two were produced in the court and released on bail immediately. The police said that sections would be altered besides securing the two boys.
title: Assaulted student dies
